name: Sonic GDevelop
description:
The sonic game framework of GDevelop, based on the classic genesis sonic games, GBA sonic advance series and the Nintendo DS sonic rush series, a mix of the elements that these games bring, in a high-speed adventure.

The game is available on PC and Android, and it includes gamepad support
For suggestions and bug reports, join the discord: https://discord.gg/Wbp7SUNqq9

This is a demo of the version 1.0 that's currently in development
